name: Prediction
description: To predict an output based on input parameters provided

templates.name: Overview
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/prediction --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=prediction_overview

templates.name: Regression
templates.description: To estimate the relationships between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/prediction --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=regression
